Headline: #74 Fullerton Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Fullerton/Halsted
ShortDescription: EB 74 Fullerton buses temp. rerouted: Fullerton, Sheffield, Diversey, Halsted, Webster, Sheffield, and Fullerton due to, street blockage near Fullerton/Halsted.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #74 Fullerton buses temp. rerouted: Fullerton, Sheffield, Diversey, Halsted, Webster, Sheffield, and Fullerton due to, street blockage near Fullerton/Halsted.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green and Pink Line Service Delayed near Ashland/Lake
ShortDescription: Green and Pink Line trains are standing near Ashland/Lake due to track switching problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green and Pink Line trains are standing near Ashland/Lake due to track switching problems.
